Hello! ሰላም！

Finally, Multi Language Tigrinya Dictionary App for PC and Mobile phones!

We’ve built the first full Multi Language Tigrinya Dictionary App for PC and Mobile phones. Access via desktop, laptop, tablet and mobile phones, wherever you are.

Download the app today

What does it do?

  • Translate words between Tigrinya, English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Arabic and Amharic.
  • Audio pronunciation.
  • Word of the day notification.
  • Display recently searched words.
  • Displayed favourite words.

Got Ideas?

Are we missing a word? We’re adding to the dictionary all the time but let us know if you’ve spotting something we missed.

Our team is busy! We’re working on some other ideas to make the dictionary even better. Got feedback? We’d love to hear it. Get in touch at info@tigrinyadictionary.co.uk.
